Articles.Content: Will get to more tweaks this weekend

Is it possible to use this with the Outer Planets Mod?

I'm also unclear whether this adds a new solar system, or just new planets though it seems like it's the second. A picture of the solar system layout would be much appreciated.

But yeah, this looks fantastic! Looking forward to trying it out, very interesting planets.

Nice to see your planets being converted. I still have them loaded into an old program folder with Planet Factory. I replaced Dudley with your original Fearless planet. I always liked these planets. Looking forward to the additions you make to the systems.

Is it possible to use this with the Outer Planets Mod?

I'm also unclear whether this adds a new solar system, or just new planets though it seems like it's the second. A picture of the solar system layout would be much appreciated.

But yeah, this looks fantastic! Looking forward to trying it out, very interesting planets.

It adds new planets, I've heard it works with OPM, not sure though.
Nice to see your planets being converted. I still have them loaded into an old program folder with Planet Factory. I replaced Dudley with your original Fearless planet. I always liked these planets. Looking forward to the additions you make to the systems.
Additions might be a while, might cobble something together on the weekend. Make a planet or an extra moon, still working on getting Brag's atmosphere where I want it (ludicrously low as always)
Probably will be finalizing the Atmo of brag tonight
Couldn't get to it yet, any ideas out there?

Finally have an atmosphere calculator, this makes this soooo much easier

- - - Updated - - -

Improved Boris Atmosphere, you are going to want airbrakes to help you aerobrake. Also you are going to want to not hit the many many ridges and high elevations on it.

Should be releasing later today.

Finally have an atmosphere calculator, this makes this soooo much easier

- - - Updated - - -

Improved Boris Atmosphere, you are going to want airbrakes to help you aerobrake. Also you are going to want to not hit the many many ridges and high elevations on it.

Should be releasing later today.

If you don't mind me asking what did you use to calculate the atmosphere? I was kind of looking out for something to make it easier to make pressure curves for planets. Thanks!
Sent you a pm
@medikohl please don't spread around my calculator too much, i don't mind but i want to make sure that noone destroys it
made a backup copy and sent you the link.
Working on a new planet
Fixed the ocean issue with Fearless
Going to be a few more days till the update

yay 500 downloads!

(breaks out the balloons)
Is this still compatible with KSP 1.0.4?
It does, yes...but you may want to update the kopernicus dependency, as it uses an older version not made for 1.0.4
Sorry been busy these last few weeks, will be getting back to adding new content as soon as I figure out how to generate a normal map from a heightmap

just drag and drop here bro:

http://cpetry.github.io/NormalMap-Online/

any issues, gimme another yell
Ohai! I added your planet pack to the list on http://outer-planets.wikia.com/wiki/Planet_Packs

Thank you Amedee,

Also thanks to KillAshley. Working on a new world right now.

Still deciding whether or not to have a long elliptical orbit that passes close to the sun rarely, or to just have it a tidally locked body that only the dark side is safe.
Oooh, nice. Definitely sticking with the Boris pack's style and I see some interesting features.
This upcoming update fixes Fearless BTW
Oceans were appearing that shouldn't be there

New update is in, the final look I'm using for Saiyraes

- - - Updated - - -

Beware of the low point of the orbit.
